                              # Futureä½¿ç”¨

                              åˆ©ç”¨ FutureTask åˆ›å»º Future

                              Futureå®é™…é‡‡ç”¨FutureTaskå®ç°ï¼Œè¯¥å¯¹è±¡ç›¸å½“äºæ˜¯æ¶ˆè´¹è€…å’Œç”Ÿäº§è€…çš„æ¡¥æ¢ï¼Œæ¶ˆè´¹è€…é€šè¿‡ FutureTask å­˜å‚¨ä»»åŠ¡çš„å¤„ç†ç»“æœï¼Œæ›´æ–°ä»»åŠ¡çš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼šæœªå¼€å§‹ã€æ­£åœ¨å¤„ç†ã€å·²å®Œæˆç­‰ã€‚è€Œç”Ÿäº§è€…æ‹¿åˆ°çš„ FutureTask è¢«è½¬å‹ä¸º Future æ¥å£ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é˜»å¡å¼è·å–ä»»åŠ¡çš„å¤„ç†ç»“æœï¼Œéé˜»å¡å¼è·å–ä»»åŠ¡å¤„ç†çŠ¶æ€ã€‚

                              public class FutureTaskDemo {

    public static void main(String[] args) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
        Task task = new Task();
        //æ„å»ºfutureTask
        FutureTask<Integer> futureTask = new FutureTask<>(task);
        //ä½œä¸ºRunnableå…¥å‚
        new Thread(futureTask).start();

        System.out.println("ä¸»ç¨‹åºç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œã€‚ã€‚");

        System.out.println("taskè¿è¡Œç»“æœï¼š"+futureTask.get());
    }

    static class Task implements Callable<Integer> {

        @Override
        public Integer call() throws Exception {
            System.out.println("å­çº¿ç¨‹æ­£åœ¨è®¡ç®—");
            int sum = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++) {
                sum += i;
            }
            // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸šåŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´
            Thread.sleep(1000);
            return sum;
        }
    }
}

                              # CompleteableFuture

                              ç®€å•çš„ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œç”¨Futureè·å–ç»“æœè¿˜å¥½ï¼Œä½†æˆ‘ä»¬å¹¶è¡Œæäº¤çš„å¤šä¸ªå¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå¾€å¾€å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹çš„ï¼Œå¾ˆå¤šæ—¶å€™ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘å¤„ç†å­˜åœ¨ä¸²è¡Œ[ä¾èµ–]ã€å¹¶è¡Œã€èšåˆçš„å…³ç³»ã€‚å¦‚æœè¦æˆ‘ä»¬æ‰‹åŠ¨ç”¨ Fueture å®ç°ï¼Œæ˜¯éå¸¸éº»çƒ¦çš„ã€‚

                              JDK1.8 æ‰æ–°åŠ å…¥çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå®ç°ç±» CompletableFutureï¼Œå®ç°äº† Future<T>ï¼ŒCompletionStage<T>ä¸¤ä¸ªæ¥å£ã€‚å®ç°äº† Future æ¥å£ï¼Œæ„å‘³ç€å¯ä»¥åƒä»¥å‰ä¸€æ ·é€šè¿‡é˜»å¡æˆ–è€…è½®è¯¢çš„æ–¹å¼è·å¾—ç»“æœã€‚

                              CompletionStageæ¥å£: æ‰§è¡ŒæŸä¸€ä¸ªé˜¶æ®µï¼Œå¯å‘ä¸‹æ‰§è¡Œåç»­é˜¶æ®µã€‚å¼‚æ­¥æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œé»˜è®¤çº¿ç¨‹æ± æ˜¯ForkJoinPool.commonPool()ã€‚å®ƒä»£è¡¨

                              • runAsync æ–¹æ³•ä»¥Runnableå‡½æ•°å¼æ¥å£ç±»å‹ä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰è¿”å›ç»“æœï¼ŒsupplyAsync æ–¹æ³•Supplierå‡½æ•°å¼æ¥å£ç±»å‹ä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œè¿”å›ç»“æœç±»å‹ä¸ºUï¼›Supplier æ¥å£çš„ get() æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼çš„ï¼ˆä¼šé˜»å¡ï¼‰ï¼Œ

                              public static void main(String[] args) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {

    Runnable runnable = () -> System.out.println("æ‰§è¡Œæ— è¿”å›ç»“æœçš„å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡");
    CompletableFuture.runAsync(runnable);

    CompletableFuture<String> future = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
        System.out.println("æ‰§è¡Œæœ‰è¿”å›å€¼çš„å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡");
        try {
            Thread.sleep(5000);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return "ä½ å¥½ 2022";
    });
    String result = future.join();
    System.out.println(result);

}

                              public static void main(String[] args) {
    CompletableFuture<Integer> future = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(()->{
       int i = 1/0;
       return 100;
    });

    future.join();
}

                              public CompletableFuture<T> whenComplete(BiConsumer<? super T,? super Throwable> action)

                              • æ–¹æ³•ä¸ä»¥Asyncç»“å°¾ï¼Œæ„å‘³ç€Actionä½¿ç”¨ç›¸åŒçš„çº¿ç¨‹æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œè€ŒAsyncå¯èƒ½ä¼šä½¿ç”¨å…¶å®ƒçš„çº¿ç¨‹å»æ‰§è¡Œ(å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨ç›¸åŒçš„çº¿ç¨‹æ± ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯èƒ½ä¼šè¢«åŒä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹é€‰ä¸­æ‰§è¡Œ)ã€‚
                              • è¿™å‡ ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•éƒ½ä¼šè¿”å›CompletableFutureï¼Œå½“Actionæ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•åå®ƒçš„ç»“æœè¿”å›åŸå§‹çš„CompletableFutureçš„è®¡ç®—ç»“æœæˆ–è€…è¿”å›å¼‚å¸¸
                              
    public static void main(String[] args) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {

        CompletableFuture<String> future = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
            try {
                TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(1);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            }
            if (new Random().nextInt(10) % 2 == 0) {
                int i = 12 / 0;
            }
            System.out.println("æ‰§è¡Œç»“æŸï¼");
            return "test";
        });

        future.whenComplete(new BiConsumer<String, Throwable>() {
            @Override
            public void accept(String t, Throwable action) {
                System.out.println(t+" æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆï¼");
            }
        });

        // å¼‚å¸¸æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œ
        future.exceptionally(new Function<Throwable, String>() {
            @Override
            public String apply(Throwable t) {
                System.out.println("æ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥ï¼š" + t.getMessage());
                return "å¼‚å¸¸xxxx";
            }
        }).join();
    }

                              public <U> CompletionStage<Void> thenAcceptBoth(CompletionStage<? extends U> other,BiConsumer<? super T, ? super U> action);
public <U> CompletionStage<Void> thenAcceptBothAsync(CompletionStage<? extends U> other,BiConsumer<? super T, ? super U> action);

                                  public static void main(String[] args) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
        CompletableFuture<Integer> futrue1 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(new Supplier<Integer>() {
            @Override
            public Integer get() {
                int number = new Random().nextInt(3) + 1;
                try {
                    TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(number);
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
                System.out.println("ç¬¬ä¸€é˜¶æ®µï¼š" + number);
                return number;
            }
        });

        CompletableFuture<Integer> future2 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(new Supplier<Integer>() {
            @Override
            public Integer get() {
                int number = new Random().nextInt(3) + 1;
                try {
                    TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(number);
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
                System.out.println("ç¬¬äºŒé˜¶æ®µï¼š" + number);
                return number;
            }
        });

        futrue1.thenAcceptBoth(future2, new BiConsumer<Integer, Integer>() {
            @Override
            public void accept(Integer x, Integer y) {
                System.out.println("æœ€ç»ˆç»“æœï¼š" + (x + y));
            }
        });

        future2.get();
    }

                .supplyAsync(new Supplier<Integer>() {
                    @Override
                    public Integer get() {
                        int number = new Random().nextInt(10);
                        System.out.println("ç¬¬ä¸€é˜¶æ®µï¼š" + number);
                        return number;
                    }
                });
        CompletableFuture<Integer> future2 = CompletableFuture
                .supplyAsync(new Supplier<Integer>() {
                    @Override
                    public Integer get() {
                        int number = new Random().nextInt(10);
                        System.out.println("ç¬¬äºŒé˜¶æ®µï¼š" + number);
                        return number;

                });
        CompletableFuture<Integer> result = future1
                .thenCombine(future2, new BiFunction<Integer, Integer, Integer>() {
                    @Override

    }

                              public <U> CompletionStage<U> applyToEither(CompletionStage<? extends T> other,Function<? super T, U> fn); public <U> CompletionStage<U> applyToEitherAsync(CompletionStage<? extends T> other,Function<? super T, U> fn);

        CompletableFuture<Integer> future1 = CompletableFuture
                .supplyAsync(new Supplier<Integer>() {
                    @Override
                    public Integer get() {
                        int number = new Random().nextInt(10);
                        System.out.println("ç¬¬ä¸€é˜¶æ®µstartï¼š" + number);
                        try {
                            TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(number);
                        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                            e.printStackTrace();
                        }
                        System.out.println("ç¬¬ä¸€é˜¶æ®µendï¼š" + number);
                        return number;
                    }
                });
        CompletableFuture<Integer> future2 = CompletableFuture
                .supplyAsync(new Supplier<Integer>() {
                    @Override
                    public Integer get() {
                        int number = new Random().nextInt(10);
                        System.out.println("ç¬¬äºŒé˜¶æ®µstartï¼š" + number);
                        try {
                            TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(number);
                        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                            e.printStackTrace();

            @Override
            public Integer apply(Integer number) {
                System.out.println("æœ€å¿«ç»“æœï¼š" + number);
                return number * 2;
            }
        });
        future1.get();
    }

                              public CompletionStage<Void> acceptEither(CompletionStage<? extends T> other,Consumer<? super T> action);

                            TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(number);
                        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                            e.printStackTrace();

                    }

                              allOf

                              allOfæ–¹æ³•ç”¨æ¥å®ç°å¤š CompletableFuture çš„åŒæ—¶è¿”å›ã€‚

                              public static CompletableFuture<Object> anyOf(CompletableFuture<?>... cfs)
public static CompletableFuture<Void> allOf(CompletableFuture<?>... cfs)

                               public static void main(String[] args) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
        Random rand = new Random();
        CompletableFuture<Integer> future1 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
            try {
                Thread.sleep(1000 + rand.nextInt(1000));
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            System.out.println("future1å®Œæˆ");
            return 100;
        });
        CompletableFuture<String> future2 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
            try {
                Thread.sleep(2000 + rand.nextInt(1000));
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            System.out.println("future2å®Œæˆ");
            return "abc";
        });
        CompletableFuture<String> future3 = CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(() -> {
            try {
                Thread.sleep(3000 + rand.nextInt(1000));
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            System.out.println("future3å®Œæˆ");
            return "123abc";
        });
        CompletableFuture.allOf(future1,future2,future3).thenRun(()->{
            System.out.println("All done!");
        });

        CompletableFuture<Object> f = CompletableFuture.anyOf(future1,future2,future3);
        System.out.println("ç»“æœï¼š"+f.get());

        TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(5);
    }

                              future1å®Œæˆ ç»“æœï¼š100 future2å®Œæˆ future3å®Œæˆ All done!

                              CompletableFutureå¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•æ€»ç»“

                              åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯

                              æè¿°ä¾èµ–å…³ç³»ï¼š

                              1. thenApply() æŠŠå‰é¢å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡çš„ç»“æœï¼Œäº¤ç»™åé¢çš„Function
                              2. thenCompose()ç”¨æ¥è¿æ¥ä¸¤ä¸ªæœ‰ä¾èµ–å…³ç³»çš„ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œç»“æœç”±ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä»»åŠ¡è¿”å›

                              æè¿°andèšåˆå…³ç³»ï¼š

                              1. thenCombine:ä»»åŠ¡åˆå¹¶ï¼Œæœ‰è¿”å›å€¼
                              2. thenAccepetBoth:ä¸¤ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆåï¼Œå°†ç»“æœäº¤ç»™thenAccepetBothæ¶ˆè€—ï¼Œæ— è¿”å›å€¼ã€‚
                              3. runAfterBoth:ä¸¤ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡éƒ½æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆåï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥æ“ä½œï¼ˆRunnableï¼‰ã€‚

                              æè¿°orèšåˆå…³ç³»ï¼š
